google.title: Jojo AI: Language Tutor
google.description:
Master Any Language with Jojo — Your AI Speaking Tutor

Go beyond phrasebooks, random chatbots, and passive learning apps. Jojo is your AI-powered native speaking tutor, guiding you through complete, structured lessons from start to finish — so you can speak any language naturally and confidently in real-life situations.

Whether you’re learning Spanish, Chinese, French, Japanese, Korean, English, or more, Jojo transforms real-world scenarios into interactive, voice-driven speaking lessons that feel just like practicing with a real native tutor — available 24/7, right on your phone.

Built for Real Conversation Skills:
Jojo isn’t about memorizing isolated phrases. Every lesson follows a proven path: vocabulary, grammar, guided speaking, and roleplays. You’ll learn the exact words, sentence patterns, and pronunciation you need — then immediately apply them in realistic, back-and-forth conversations.

End-to-End Lessons, AI-Powered:
From introducing a topic to practicing it in context, Jojo’s AI walks you through each step:

1. Learn: Get clear, bite-sized explanations of grammar, vocabulary, and cultural context.
2. Practice: Say it out loud, get instant corrections, and repeat until it feels natural.
3. Apply: Jump into immersive roleplays where Jojo responds like a real native speaker.

Roleplays That Feel Real:
Order food in Tokyo, negotiate in Paris, chat with friends in Madrid, or navigate a taxi ride in Beijing — Jojo adapts each roleplay to your target language, level, and learning goals. You’ll get instant feedback, pronunciation help, and cultural tips to make your speech authentic and confident.

On-Demand Pronunciation, Grammar & Translation Support:
Tap any phrase to hear native pronunciation, see translations, and explore grammar notes. Learn alternative expressions so you can adapt to any conversation.

Your Personal AI Speaking Coach:
Need to slow down, ask “How would a native say this?”, or get a cultural explanation? Jojo responds instantly — giving you the personalized, on-demand guidance of a live tutor without scheduling or time limits.

Practice Smarter, Remember Longer:
Jojo tracks every word and phrase you practice, reinforcing them with smart spaced repetition so your progress sticks and your fluency grows.

Achieve Your Language Learning Goals:
With Jojo, you’ll go beyond textbook knowledge to speak naturally in the real world. Perfect for learners aiming to:
- Speak confidently in professional, travel, or social settings
- Prepare for language proficiency exams
- Build conversational fluency quickly
- Connect with people and cultures around the world

Subscription Details:
Full access to all lessons requires a subscription. Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the period. Your Apple account will be charged within 24 hours prior to renewal. Manage your subscription anytime in your Apple Account Settings.

Privacy Policy: https://talktojojo.com/legal/privacy-policy 

CONTACT US: 
Questions or feedback? Email us at support@talktojojo.com
